User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the ManasMitra application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

phoneNumber.description: The user's phone number, used for OTP verification.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Path-based ownership ensures only the user (or admin) can access their profile data.
